article_title: Health Care Prices Remain A Secret In Most States

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: When it comes to requiring healthcare prices to be made public, only five states adequately make the information transparent to consumers. The third annual report from the Health Care Incentives Improvement Institute and Catalyst for Payment Reform shows little progress is being made despite what seems to be more activity in [...]
